com.commercetools.sunrise.productcatalog.productsuggestions

Class ProductSuggestionsControllerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sunrise.productcatalog.productsuggestions.ProductSuggestionsControllerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerComponent, SunriseComponent, ConsumerHook, PageDataReadyHook, EventHook, ProductProjectionLoadedHook, Hook

    public class ProductSuggestionsControllerComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerComponent, ProductProjectionLoadedHook, PageDataReadyHook
    Loads some other products that are related to the loaded product in the controller.
